title: Sad, Sad and Sad
review: This is one of the films that are so good but you will never want to see it again. The director did a fantastic job. The music was spot on. Connally and leto did an amazing work.

title: Silent disaster
review: Dont go by the high rating this movie is trash. 2/3 of the movie doesn't make sense. The director tried to be smart but failed miserably. And did i say this movie is boring.
